meanings.definition: The quality of being true or accurate.
meanings.sent1: Her veritableness in telling the truth was admired by everyone.
meanings.sent2: The veritableness of the historical documents was confirmed by experts.
meanings.sent3: His claim of being a superhero was met with skepticism due to his veritableness.
meanings.sent4: The veritableness of her love for him shone through in every gesture.
meanings.sent5: The veritableness of the diamond's purity was unquestionable.

meanings.definition: The state of being genuine or authentic.
meanings.sent1: The veritableness of the designer handbag was doubted by many.
meanings.sent2: His veritableness as a leader was unquestioned by his followers.
meanings.sent3: The veritableness of the painting's signature was called into question.
meanings.sent4: The veritableness of her smile lit up the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The veritableness of his excuse for being late was met with raised eyebrows.
